name: House architecture design in Manhattan, New York
description: A stunning architectural design for a private residence in Manhattan, featuring modern aesthetics and innovative space utilization.
additional: The design incorporates sustainable materials and energy-efficient solutions. It also includes cutting-edge smart home technology.

name: Interior design in Brooklyn Heights, New York
description: An interior design project showcasing sophisticated and elegant elements for a residence in Brooklyn Heights.
additional: The interior features custom-made furniture and state-of-the-art lighting solutions. Sustainable materials were used in the design.

name: Offices architecture design in Chelsea, New York
description: Architectural design for modern office spaces in the vibrant neighborhood of Chelsea, New York.
additional: The office design emphasizes collaborative workspaces and sustainable design principles. It includes rooftop green spaces for employees.

name: Building design in Manhattan, New York
description: A visionary building design contributing to the iconic skyline of Manhattan, harmonizing aesthetics and functionality.
additional: The building design incorporates smart technology for energy management and security. It features a LEED-certified sustainable architecture.
